description: Try our easy to follow Wild Rice With Sun-dried Tomatoes & Cashew Nuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Wild Rice With Sun-dried Tomatoes & Cashew Nuts
name: Wild Rice With Sun-dried Tomatoes & Cashew Nuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350 g packet long-grain and wild rice

recipeInstructions.text: Stir through the chopped sun-dried tomatoes, then toast the cashew nuts in a dry frying pan over a low heat for 5 minutes until lightly golden. Add to the rice mixture, and stir through. Taste, and adjust the seasoning if needed. Serve hot.
